alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 3:52AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla, eastern Gadsden, Jefferson, Leon and northeastern Franklin Counties through 430 AM EDT... At 351 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Havana to 10 miles west of Crawfordville to 10 miles northeast of Carrabelle. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Tallahassee, Havana, St. Marks, Midway, Woodville, Crawfordville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Florida A And M, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Alma, Cody, Wakulla Springs, Florence, Medart and Tallahassee Mall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon
